name: Disoriented Future - Expressive Game Design
description:
How to Play

Move by using the arrow keys on your keyboard. 

← Left   ↑ Up   ↓ Down   → Right

Brief

You start off in a town, touch the blue squares (represented as people) to gain friends. Over time you'll reach a point where you end up losing friends. The objective is to lose as little amount of friends as possible or you'll be lonely .. forever alone.
